projects.name: Acroquad
text: Built for my EE 106A final project, Acroquad is a drone controlled by computer vision. It takes in input from its camera, processes the movement, and actuates in predefined responses to the commands.

projects.name: YouTube Controls
text: A Chrome extension that extends the YouTube video player. In addition to the basic Pause/Play functions, it allows setting custom speed and skip values and skipping ads. Perfect for watching lecture webcasts, or just for everyday use!
